name: Duality (itch) (ibiza347)
description:
ПЕРВАЯ ЗАГРУЗКА ДОЛГАЯ ДОЖДИТЕСЬ.  FIRST LOAD LONG!!!!!!!

Enter the courage and feel the close relationship of entities in the game. The rules are simple: control two synchronously moving anti-blacks, survive against all odds and keep your cool.

Your life depends on whether you can keep both states of dualism (black and white, fire and water, etc.) which are synchronized devices coexisting simultaneously and in symbiosis. Feel the irresistible excitement. Let the world around you calm down and freeze.
